Class BlueprintsServices

java.lang.Object
edu.eci.arsw.blueprints.services.BlueprintsServices
@Service public class BlueprintsServices extends Object
Service for managing blueprints.
Author:
dsbaenar, hcadavid

  • Constructor Details

    • BlueprintsServices

      public BlueprintsServices(BlueprintsPersistence bpp, BlueprintFilter bpf, @Qualifier("redundancyFilter") BlueprintFilter redundancyFilter, @Qualifier("subsamplingFilter") BlueprintFilter subsamplingFilter)
      Constructor for BlueprintsServices.
      Parameters:
      bpp - the blueprint persistence
      bpf - the blueprint filter
      redundancyFilter - the redundancy filter
      subsamplingFilter - the subsampling filter

  • Method Details

    • addNewBlueprint

      public Blueprint addNewBlueprint(Blueprint bp) throws BlueprintPersistenceException
      This method adds a new blueprint to the system
      Parameters:
      bp - the new blueprint
      Returns:
      the added blueprint
      Throws:
      BlueprintPersistenceException - if a blueprint with the same name already exists

    • getAllBlueprints

      public Set<Blueprint> getAllBlueprints() throws BlueprintPersistenceException
      Get all blueprints.
      Returns:
      all the blueprints in the system
      Throws:
      BlueprintPersistenceException - if there are no blueprints

    • getBlueprint

      public Blueprint getBlueprint(String author, String name) throws BlueprintNotFoundException
      Parameters:
      author - blueprint's author
      name - blueprint's name
      Returns:
      the blueprint of the given name created by the given author
      Throws:
      BlueprintNotFoundException - if there is no such blueprint

    • getBlueprintsByAuthor

      public Set<Blueprint> getBlueprintsByAuthor(String author) throws BlueprintPersistenceException
      Parameters:
      author - blueprint's author
      Returns:
      all the blueprints of the given author
      Throws:
      BlueprintPersistenceException - if the given author doesn't exist

    • getBlueprintsByName

      public Set<Blueprint> getBlueprintsByName(String name) throws BlueprintPersistenceException
      Parameters:
      name - blueprint's name
      Returns:
      all the blueprints with the given name
      Throws:
      BlueprintPersistenceException - if the given name doesn't exist

    • addFilter

      public void addFilter(BlueprintFilter filter)
      Adds a filter to the service.
      Parameters:
      filter - the filter to add

    • addFilter

      public void addFilter(String filterName)
      Activates a blueprint filter by name. Recognized values (case-insensitive): - "redundancy" or "redundancyFilter" - "subsample", "subsampling" or "subsamplingFilter" Pass null to deactivate filters (will return unfiltered blueprints).
      Parameters:
      filterName - the name of the filter to activate

    • updateBlueprint

      public void updateBlueprint(String name, String filter) throws BlueprintNotFoundException, BlueprintPersistenceException
      Updates an existing blueprint.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the blueprint to update
      filter - the filter to apply (if any)
      Throws:
      BlueprintNotFoundException - if the blueprint doesn't exist
      BlueprintPersistenceException - if there's an error during persistence

    • deleteBlueprint

      public void deleteBlueprint(String name) throws BlueprintNotFoundException, BlueprintPersistenceException
      Deletes an existing blueprint.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the blueprint to delete
      Throws:
      BlueprintNotFoundException - if the blueprint doesn't exist
      BlueprintPersistenceException - if there's an error during persistence
